categories.name: career-batting
descriptions: Games Played
The number of times a batter comes up to bat not counting walks and sacrifices.
The number of runs scored.
The number of hits.
The number of times that a batter reaches second base as the result of a hit without an error being committed.
The number of hits that result in the batter reaching 3rd base without the aid of an error.
The number of hits that allowed the batter to round the bases and score without the aid of an error of the defense.
The number of runs scored by a batter's play.
The number of times a batter reaches base on four balls
The number of times a player has been by a pitch.
The number of times a player strikes out.
The number of bases stolen.
The number of times that a baserunner attempts to steal a base but is thrown out.
The average number of times the batter reached successfully on base due to a hit: hits / atBats
The ratio of the number of times the batter reached base per plate appearnce: (hits + walks + hbp / plateAppearances)
Slugging percentage is a metric that is meant to measuring how many bases the hitter safely advances to after making contact with the ball: (totalBases / atBats)
The average calculated by adding up on-base percentage and slugging percentage.
Wins Above Replacement.

categories.name: postseason-batting
descriptions: Games Played
The number of times a batter comes up to bat not counting walks and sacrifices.
The number of runs scored.
The number of hits.
The number of times that a batter reaches second base as the result of a hit without an error being committed.
The number of hits that result in the batter reaching 3rd base without the aid of an error.
The number of hits that allowed the batter to round the bases and score without the aid of an error of the defense.
The number of runs scored by a batter's play.
The number of times a batter reaches base on four balls
The number of times a player has been by a pitch.
The number of times a player strikes out.
The number of bases stolen.
The number of times that a baserunner attempts to steal a base but is thrown out.
The average number of times the batter reached successfully on base due to a hit: hits / atBats
The ratio of the number of times the batter reached base per plate appearnce: (hits + walks + hbp / plateAppearances)

categories.name: expanded-batting
descriptions: The number of times a batter comes up to bat.
The number of pitches faced.
The average number of pitches a batter sees per plate appearance.
The number of hits that are greater than singles.
The number of bases calculated as 1 for a 1B, 2 for a 2B, 3 for a 3B and 4 for a HR.
The number of times that a batter is walked by four intentionally thrown balls by the pitcher.
The number of times a player has been by a pitch.
The number of times a batter grounds into a double play.
The number of sacrifice bunts that allow baserunners to advance
The number of times a batter advances a runner with a fly out.
The number of bases stolen.
The number of times that a baserunner attempts to steal a base but is thrown out.
The percentage of stolen bases successfully stolen by a baserunner.

categories.name: advanced-batting
descriptions: Wins Above Replacement.
Offensive Wins Above Replacement.
The estimate of how many runs a player has created.
The estimated number of runs created per 27 outs played.
The measure of a batter's ability to hit for extra bases, calculated by subtracting batting average from slugging percentage.
The average of extra bases gained via hits, walks and stolen bases versus at bats.
The ratio of at bats per home run hit.
The ratio of walks to plate appearances for a batter.
The number of walks to the number of strikeouts by a batter.
The number of ground outs made by a player or team.
The number of time a batter flies out.
The ratio of ground outs to fly outs.
